list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make (previously unknown or secret information) known to others.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Brenda was forced to reveal Robbie's whereabouts
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Brenda bị buộc phải tiết lộ nơi ở của Robbie

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in a movie or television show) a final revelation of information that has previously been kept from the characters or viewers.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the big reveal at the end of the movie answers all questions
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tiết lộ lớn ở cuối bộ phim trả lời tất cả các câu hỏi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: either side surface of an aperture in a wall for a door or window.
